item.title: Parameter Estimation of Brownian Motions by Method of Moments
item.description: How to estimate the parameters of a geometric Brownian motion (GBM)? It seems rather simple but actually took me quite some time to solve it. The most intuitive way is by using the method of moments. Estimation of ABM First let us consider a simpler case, an arithmetic Brownian motion (ABM).
